channel.title: Insurgency
channel.description:
Anyone picked this up from steam?
If not, take a look at it here: http://steamcommunity.com/app/222880 http://www.playinsurgency.com/

@TabbyKiller wrote:

Minecraft, thrown into the conversation out of nowhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Insurgency
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“RUNE-PK, post:26, topic:539046”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=657884.msg4403340#msg4403340 date=1391159412]

Better than Arma? Nawwwww, never.

You mean that clunky horribly optimized wad of shit?

I’d rather play call of duty than play Arma 2 on lowest settings with a stellar 22fps in cities on a GTX 770

I get a solid 40 fps throughout Cherno and Elektro on Chernarus and Takistan I get a solid 50-60 over the board. The DayZ mod is horribly optimised and forces about 25-30 fps through the bigger cities on Chernarus.
[/quote]

I like day z mod but th original arma no just no I hate it I like the zombie games the survival type but minecraft? who the hell wants to play virtual Legos??[/quote]
Apparently millions of people enjoy playing ‘virtual Legos’, because there is more concept to the game than that.

Read full topic

Kodiak:

Been viewing a few screenshots, never really got around to any videos. So you guys are saying it’s practically along the lines of Arma 2, correct? If so then that’s a winner for me.

It’s like Arma and Counter Strike had a baby. It’s even better.

item.title: Insurgency
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Ruby:

Playing with the keyboard is the whole point of PC based FPS!

Totally not! For example, I used to play Blacklight: Retribution and there’s no way in Hell that I can play that game with the mouse pad, I know I’m not going to be able to do it with this game either. >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Insurgency
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:13, topic:539046”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=657884.msg4402494#msg4402494 date=1390974605]

heard it was like a modern red orchestra? is true?

It feels a bit smoother than RO2 in my opinion and honestly haven’t seen a game with more realistic feeling with the weaponry. Infantry only and the maps are smaller than RO2 but they’re pretty similar I suppose.
[/quote]
So the pace is realistic? One torso shot and you’re dead?[/quote]
Yep and yep.

[quote=“Soulcist, post:14, topic:539046”][quote author=Frell link=topic=657884.msg4402569#msg4402569 date=1391006259]
So the pace is realistic? One torso shot and you’re dead?
[/quote]
Just about from what I saw from the videos.

OT: I would love to play this game but there’s no way I could play this just using my computer’s keys and what not - I’d need to get a controller or at least a Xbox Controller receiver and not even sure where the Hell to get that at.[/quote]

Playing with the keyboard is the whole point of PC based FPS!

Read full topic

item.title: Insurgency
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Frell:

So the pace is realistic? One torso shot and you’re dead?

Just about from what I saw from the videos.

OT: I would love to play this game but there’s no way I could play this just using my computer’s keys and what not - I’d need to get a controller or at least a Xbox Controller receiver and not even sure where the Hell to get that at.

Read full topic

item.title: Insurgency
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Tutorial:

I’ve been trying to find a new game to play, but I don’t believe I would enjoy something like this for too long.

I can literally play it for hours upon hours without getting bored. Playing vs AI is easily one of the best gamemodes they have, along with VIP. It’s a great game. Highly recommend.

Read full topic
